name: Homepage Pop-up
author: weblinkindia pvt ltd

sections.description:
Just add a simple jquery pop-up on the home page. Display a title and an important information on your home page without getting blocked by any AdBlock.

Tested on

  • Chrome (PC, MAC), Firefox (PC, MAC), Safari (PC, MAC, iPhone, iPad), ie7-11 (PC).

Website

https://findinall.com/

Bug Submission and Forum Support

support@omsuhani

Please Vote and Enjoy

Your votes really make a difference! Thanks.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘pop-up-homepage’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Click on the new menu item “Homepage Pop-up” and create your first pop-up for your homepage!
sections.faq:
